project_description: EduTraker is an Educational Management System built with Django and Django REST Framework. It supports multiple user roles, role-based access control (RBAC), and multi-tenancy via Workstreams and Schools.

core_apps.accounts: Handles authentication, registration (portal and workstream), and user profile management. Implements strict RBAC services.
core_apps.workstream: Manages Workstreams, which are top-level containers for schools.
core_apps.student: Handles student profiles, enrollments, and related academic data.
core_apps.teacher: Manages teacher assignments and specific teacher-related data.
core_apps.manager: Provides management tools like staff evaluations.
core_apps.reports: Generates statistics and dashboard data for different roles.
